name: AL II
overview: AL II is a vertically scrolling 2D shoot'em up, originally published in a French computer magazine Hebdogiciel N°117 (10.01.1986). The planet AL 2 has decided to invade the earth. For this, she installed missiles on the far side of the moon. On board your ship you must destroy the missile launch pads. To destroy them you have to aim for the opening at the top of the silos. It's up to you to find the right height. Be careful because the fuel of the ship is limited.
